mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.task_name AS "taskName", a.method_name AS "methodName", a.method_params AS "methodParams", a.cron_type AS "cronType", a.remark AS "remark", a.task_status AS "taskStatus", a.create_time AS "createTime"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM sys_task_job a
AND a.task_status = #{taskStatus}
AND a.remark LIKE concat('%', #{remark}, '%')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_task_job( task_name, method_name, method_params, cron_type, remark, task_status, create_time ) VALUES ( #{taskName}, #{methodName}, #{methodParams}, #{cronType}, #{remark}, #{taskStatus}, sysdate() )
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_task_job SET task_name = #{taskName}, method_name = #{methodName}, method_params = #{methodParams}, cron_type = #{cronType}, remark = #{remark}, task_status = #{taskStatus} WHERE id = #{id}
